name: sax_ds
label: SAX
description: Performs the Symbolic Aggregate Approximation (SAX): implementation configured without spark distribution

inputs.name: ds_name
inputs.label: DSname
inputs.description: The name of the dataset where SAX is applied

parameters.name: alphabet_size
parameters.description: The size of the computed SAX alphabet
parameters.label: alphabet size

parameters.name: word_size
parameters.description: The number of PAA segments computed before applying SAX transformation.
parameters.label: Nb of PAA segments

outputs.name: result
outputs.label: SAX
outputs.description: The word resulting of the SAX approximation
